mapper.update: UPDATE t_front_plan SET plan_date = #{planDate}, status = #{status}, plan_precise_time = #{planPreciseTime}, remind_type = #{remindType}, actual_remind_time = #{actualRemindTime}, remark = #{remark}, arranger_id = #{arrangerId}, arrangee_id = #{arrangeeId}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} WHERE id = #{id}
